text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Mundu jwali nkusokonechela, basi (Allah) Jwaukoto wejinji channundile jwalakwejo ndaŵi (jaumi wakwe), kwikanila pandema jataachiiona yaakuŵa nkupedwa chilanga – mwine ilagasyo kapena ndaŵi (jakwichila Kiyama) – basi tachimanyilila kuti nduni jwakwete malo gakusakala ni jwaakwete asilikali ŵangali machilili.”
